§ 4501. Short title This chapter, divided into subchapters, may be cited as “the Defense Production Act of 1950”. (Sept. 8, 1950, ch. 932, § 1, 64 Stat. 798.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis chapter, referred to in text, was in the original “this Act”, meaning act Sept. 8, 1950, ch. 932, 64 Stat. 798, known as the Defense Production Act of 1950, which is classified principally to this chapter. For complete classification of this Act to the Code, see Tables.
Codification Section was formerly classified to section 2061 of the former Appendix to this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
